comment.author: Pedro
comment.text: What do you have to say about this, Michelle ? Curious....

replies.author: Michelle
replies.text: What you mean ? It's awesome. 932 pm and he is still working

replies.author: Pedro
replies.text: I'm conflicted between tolerant gullible stupid female and blatantly honest billionaire prick. What to do...what to do....

replies.author: Michelle
replies.text: Lol. Atleast with the billionaire prick you know what you're getting
